sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn is favored to win the Republican primary in North Carolina's 11th Congressional District despite several run-ins with the law and fresh allegations of insider trading.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn holds GOP primary edge despite many unflattering headlines
